sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
    CButton,
    CCard,
    CCardBody,
    CCol,
    CFormGroup,
    CInput,
    CLabel,
    CModal,
    CModalBody,
    CModalFooter,
    CModalHeader,
    CRow,
    CTextarea
} from "@coreui/react";
import * as axios from "axios";
import Cookies from "universal-cookie";

class DetailModal extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);

        this.state = {
            news: {}
        }
    }


    componentDidMount() {
        const cookies = new Cookies();

        axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/posts/${this.props.selectedItem}`,
            {
                headers: {

                    Authorization: cookies.get('token')
                }
            }
        )
            .then(response => {

                this.setState({
                    news: response.data
                })

            })
    }

    render() {

        return (
            <>
                <CModal size={'xl'}
                        show={this.props.detailModal}
                        onClose={this.props.detailModalToggle}
                >
                    <CModalHeader closeButton>News Detail</CModalHeader>
                    <CModalBody>

                        <CRow>

                            <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
                                <CCard>
                                    <CCardBody>

                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Category</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productCategory"
                                                    placeholder="Enter Product Category"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>
                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Type</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productType"
                                                    placeholder="Enter Product Type"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>

                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="supplierName">Supplier Name</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="supplierName" value={this.state.news.posttitle}/>
                                        </CFormGroup>

                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="quantity">Quantity</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productQuantity"
                                                    placeholder="Quantity"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>

                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="productDescription">Product Description</CLabel>
                                            <CTextarea name="productDescription"
                                                       placeholder="Enter Product Description"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>


                                    </CCardBody>

                                </CCard>
                            </CCol>

                            <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
                                <CCard>
                                    <CCardBody>
                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="costPrice">Cost Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productCostPrice"
                                                    placeholder="Enter your Cost Price"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>
                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="sellingPrice">Selling Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productSellingPrice"
                                                    placeholder="Enter Selling Price"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>
                                        <CFormGroup>
                                            <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountAmount">Discount Amount</CLabel>
                                            <CInput name="productDiscountAmount"
                                                    placeholder="Enter Discount Amount"/>
                                        </CFormGroup>
                                        <CFormGroup row className="my-0">
                                            <CCol xs="8">
                                                <CFormGroup>
                                                    <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountPercentage">Discount
                                                        Percentage(%)</CLabel>
                                                    <CInput name="productDiscountPercentage"
                                                            placeholder="Enter your city"/>
                                                </CFormGroup>
                                            </CCol>
                                        </CFormGroup>

                                    </CCardBody>

                                </CCard>
                            </CCol>

                        </CRow>

                    </CModalBody>
                    <CModalFooter>

                        <CButton
                            color="secondary"
                            onClick={this.props.detailModalToggle}
                        >Cancel</CButton>{' '}
                    </CModalFooter>
                </CModal>
            </>
        )
    }

}

export default DetailModal
